website_summaries.verdict: This model is a great size for kitchens with average counter space or an office break room, and is powerful enough to cook food thoroughly and evenly.
pros: 1000 watts of cooking power allows this model to handle most basic heating and cooking needs
The 1.1 cubic foot size is compact enough to fit in most home or office kitchen spaces, yet large enough to accommodate commonly microwaved dishes
10 power levels give users the ability to cook precisely and evenly
Six one-touch keys are a convenient feature
cons: This model does not have a one-touch "add time" button like many other models

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 3 years ago and it stopped working today without warning. I am kicking myself for not getting the protection plan. Honestly, I should have just picked a different brand. This is the second Danby microwave that has failed us. The one that stopped working today was the replacement for the original we purchased. We only had that one a day. Do yourself a favor and keep looking. It was great when it worked, but I expected it to last longer than 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Danya H.

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking and works
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a stainless steel type of microwave for my apartment and saw this once. I works great. The reviews had me nervous but I got it and it’s been great for my 6 months of owning it so far. No issues at all. I LOVE that it’s the kind that you can type in the EXACT time you want instead of the kind where you press 1 and it gives you a minute. Update:1 year and 6 months later and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and has been working great ever since I got it.
customer_reviews.text: Has been working great every since purchased. I did my reasearch before buying it and hoped for the best. I'm sure glad I chose this one. Perfect size and beautiful add on to my kitchen. Update: Lasted 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: N. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for now, but....
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product. Plenty big inside for our needs. However, one night I was heating up rice and chicken and it started making this weird, whining sounds... so I went back and read some of the reviews and it seems this unit is pretty low quality with lots of issues. It hasn’t died on us yet but I’m a little concerned. To be continued...
customer_reviews.author: C. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: 1 is a perfect size as it will hold a normal dinner plate
customer_reviews.text: Waited a year to write this review. Microwave has worked flawlessly. Do yourself a favor and upsize from the .7 cf to the 1.1 cubic foot. The .7 cubic foot is very small and underpowered. It also gets the most negative reviews. The 1.1 is a perfect size as it will hold a normal dinner plate, and at a 1000 watts, has plenty of power. I also have not experienced any moisture issues as noted by other reviewers. That is perhaps a problem with the smaller unit.
customer_reviews.author: TexCowart

customer_reviews.title: Heats inconsistently, door now doesn't open.
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for about a year. It's not been consistent with heating, in that 30 seconds sometimes does the trick and sometimes doesn't....for the same product. The buttons are still sensitive, but now the door is not opening when we hit the button. It's always felt cheaper (buttons, door, door opening press button), and we ordered it knowing it would likely not give use longetivity, though the ratings were favorable. So, spotty functioning, wearing parts, and disappointing that we're already seeing signs of decline after a year of using it a few times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Jujubea

customer_reviews.title: Less than Four months old and on its last legs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this microwave on March 1st if this year. As of June 29th less than 4 months the unit makes all kind of noise when running and I'm afraid it might already be on its last legs. Cannot return and my only option is to check out the manufacturer warranty to see if that helps. Would NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Holbein

customer_reviews.title: Danby 1.1 cu.ft. stainless microwave
customer_reviews.text: Love Danby 1.1 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave--stainless steel. Their first one lasted about 5 years. How did I ever get along without one prior to about 1970 when they first came out--huge and heavy, cost about $400 and lasted about 40 years. The Danby is lightweight and will scoot around on a Formica counter so recommend putting non-skid padding under unit.
customer_reviews.author: No-ma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Microwave!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful microwave! It is stainless steel inside and out. It is the perfect size. It is quiet. I totally love it. My three year old Kenmore huge thing did me a favor by periodically deciding to fire up inside even when using microwave safe containers! Made me nervous.....but I now have this perfect microwave! The price was perfect too! Definitely would recommend this even if you are just tired of your drab noisy microwave :-)
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rozanski

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I'm not enamored with the constant beeping when ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I'm not enamored with the constant beeping when things are done, but when one of my kids use it, it allows me to give them an evil stare & ask them if they are using the microwave. When I was looking to buy a new one, I had my evil redheaded stepchild (Relax!, he is over 21) check out the specifics of the 2 machines. He said they were identical. However this one is slightly larger & performs much faster than the one it replaced! Still, not a problem, but I have to wonder why the old one took much longer to perform the same thing;!
customer_reviews.author: Soemus Tarr

customer_reviews.title: Customer service made things right
customer_reviews.text: Keypad died on the unit after 4 months of very little usage.(Making popcorn once a week in a game room) I would look at another manufacturer (Panasonic perhaps) if you are planning to use it daily. I have attempted to contact customer support, but no response yet. Update-1/7/17- Danby customer service shipped me a new unit after troubleshooting my issues. I am happy with the current unit and Danby has made things right with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer #66

customer_reviews.title: Cooks well, creature comforts to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: Aside from not having a button to add 30 seconds like most microwaves, the coating on the buttons wears off very quickly. That said, it cooks food fairly well and isn't hard to clean. A couple years later, several buttons no longer work, the interior has begun to rust, and I really regret buying this. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Seems Fine
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive device. It's replacing an older microwave of the same wattage, but food takes longer to defrost, cook and reheat in this one by about 10 to 15%. It is easy to use and to clean. It lacks a quick-on button that my last one had, which allowed me to start cooking, in 30 second increments, with just the touch of the button. I miss that, because I used it a lot. So I like it, but not quite as much as my last one. I've only had it for a couple of months, but so far I'm not having any problems with it. We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: lneedle

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal. Some Design Flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Works great. Good price. Only thing I don't like is the door latch is on the bottom right which means the door swings open towards your left hand, which has a plate in it so it's kind of awkward. The buttons are practically invisible unless you have a good light right on it, but you are standing in front of it so fat chance. I keep a small flashlight on top of the microwave so I can see the buttons. But for $89 can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave, good value.
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave for the size, wattage, features and price. We bought it as a second unit to speed up reheating our family's 5 or 6 plates on "leftover nights." It serves the purpose well. Nothing fancy, just a good solid unit so far. I've read some reviews about the beeping being loud or the overall noise the unit makes, but none of that is excessive or annoying to me. We love the stainless interior and the exterior look as well. Happy with our Danby so far!
customer_reviews.author: lawnmower man

customer_reviews.title: Does it all very well for most people.  Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I was looking for. Powerful cooking. Stainless in and out. Light comes on when you open the door. Easy to read and use the numbers. Reasonably quiet cooking, and just the right beeps. Arrived in 3 days instead of two - my other 2 order items arrived as promised in 2 days via UPS, but this one was transferred to US postal for some reason and arrived a day later. No big deal though. Overall, the oven works great, does everything I wanted, and the price was really good. Quality of the oven build is tops. Im very happy with Amazon - and with free shipping, I cant see shopping anywhere else now for most things. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product nearly 4 years later
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this oven several times in the week since I bought it but it but I am very happy with it. It looks great and works great. It replaced a microwave I had used for nearly 30 years. The manual that came with it was specifically written for this model. I would add a 6th star for that since, obviously, microwaves have changed in 30 years. I read it from cover to cover and am confident in using it, although I may have to learn a bit more about the variable power levels and how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fillbach

customer_reviews.title: over all keep on looking for something that looks and acts like it is supposed
customer_reviews.text: Confusing cooking instructions, roughly made screws protruding from the base, overall tinny feel, and my biggest complaint was when I started it yes the motor is quieter than my old oven but this one rattled and clang so badly I thought it was going to fall to pieces...the only thing that helped was placing a cushion material under it...over all keep on looking for something that looks and acts like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.author: K.G. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: like people have said
customer_reviews.text: We bought this microwave almost a month ago, and the lighting on the front is in no way dim, like people have said, the beeping notification is not annoyingly loud, the overall "loudness" of it when it is running, is nowhere as loud as our previous microwave. The interior is very nice and spacey. After looking around at quite a few microwaves, we decided we would give this a shot, and we are very happy with it so far. We got 2 microwaves from the local wal mart, and both went out within the first day, so we wanted to give Amazon a shot, since there is a better variety. Will update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: David781

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Microwave stopped working almost two years to the day i ordered it. I checked the fuses and internal electronics for any damage, could not find any. My last microwave lasted for almost 16 years. I gave two stars because when it was working it did a good job with a good defrost option. Update: I tried the fuses one more time before giving up and one was giving me a false OK; I changed the fuse and microwave works again.
customer_reviews.author: lucinn lee

customer_reviews.title: After a month of moderate use, the plastic keypad ...
customer_reviews.text: After less than a month of moderate use, the plastic keypad began to disintegrate. Now, after operating the unit for about 2 months, the keypad is extremely difficult to see and requires more touch-pressure to program. Shoddy workmanship / materials prevents me from recommending this item to others.
customer_reviews.author: JEH

customer_reviews.title: but it seems to be working just fine. Don't like there's no instant cook button like ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few months, but it seems to be working just fine. Don't like there's no instant cook button like my old one (30 sec add button), but it is far more powerful. It is a larger model but the price was right, so I had to adjust my space for it. Overall, so far so good. If it lasts more then 5 years I will upgrade it to a Five.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Fox

customer_reviews.title: This microwave is the best. You type in numbers and hit start
customer_reviews.text: A microwave is something that you only notice when they are frustrating to use. This microwave is the best. You type in numbers and hit start. Much better than the ones where you push numbers and it has them preset to some sort of automatic thing. This does have the automatic functions. So far I've used the popcorn setting which seemed to work ok. The unit is great stainless steel construction and plenty big for a large dinner plate. I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fleck

customer_reviews.title: great buy affordable price
customer_reviews.text: its a great looking microwave... i wouldn't go any smaller in size or power.. works perfect does just as good as my old one that was 1.2 cubic feet
customer_reviews.author: A redneck

customer_reviews.title: Defrosts meat without cooking it!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this microwave is that it defrosts meat without drying out and partially cooking the edges. Other than that, the stainless steal model looks good in my kitchen and the stainless steal inside is easy to clean. I bought this to replace a 12 year old Emerson 1100 watt microwave, which was an awesome microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but be warned
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but be warned....you cannot turn off the beep at the end. And, if you're busy doing something and don't immediately get to the microwave, it will keep beeping every minute or so. My advice, even if you're busy, just go open the door so the d@mn thing will stop alerting. Otherwise, it's great. Looks sleek and is a good capacity, not too big, not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: They obviously don't stand behind their products AND have terrible communication with their own warehouse
customer_reviews.text: The microwave itself was ok, but somehow the door caught on fire (minor fire) and burnt the door. We called Danby to purchase a new door (we were willing to pay) and it all seemed well. We waited over 8 month, contacting them at least twice, and kept getting the excuse that it was coming from the warehouse. We never got our new door & eventually gave up. Customer service for Danby is awful. They obviously don't stand behind their products AND have terrible communication with their own warehouse! We're not impressed!
customer_reviews.author: CandyJW RN

customer_reviews.title: Passably adequate - 3 months of ownership
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, not terrible. Passably adequate. I've owned this microwave for a few months now. It works and it's cheap. But it seems underpowered for the claimed level, and there are corners cut. There were cosmetic defects on the inside of the unit and the button covering is a very cheap film that easily separates from its backing.
customer_reviews.author: Tarik

customer_reviews.title: Hot, melty goodness
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave! The brushed chrome finish looks fantastic. Works well and has a pretty large capacity - no problem whatsoever putting a full sized dinner plate right in. No complaints with heating/cooking. Easy to remove interior dish/plate for cleaning. It's a little on the heavy side, so make sure you put it on a counter top or other sturdy surface. So far (about a week in), no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely designer!
customer_reviews.text: The microwave has a great clean look with the stainless exterior AND interior. It's a little larger and has more power than our previous microwave, but can't imagine having another one smaller or with less power. We've had this for a few weeks now and have not experienced or expect to experience any issues. Definitely a great value and product.
customer_reviews.author: Riverwood1

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I really can't give you a huge review on this one - it is MUCH bigger than I anticipated and I only have so much space in my new kitchen. I would recommend you really measure it out first before buying, if you are limited on space. I unfortunately had to return it. But I can tell you it seems very well made and sturdy - like it will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: SH18750

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality and Low Cost Compared to Big Brands
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of Danby electronics so I took a chance on this microwave after reading mostly positive reviews and I am happy to say I am still pleased with my decision. This microwave looks nice and sleek and cooks hot very fast so keep an eye on food in there until you are used to it. we've had it for a few months now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: reviews-by-T

customer_reviews.title: Weak door hinge
customer_reviews.text: The door hinges seem to be very weak. I’ve only had it a year and a half, and I have to push up on the door to let it release, because this product is manufactured in a poor way. My previous microwave lasted for over a decade, and the door hinges were never an issue. In addition to probably never buying a product from Danby again, I’ve also learned I will be avoiding the high maintenance of a chrome finish. No thank you.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: ... was a relatively cheap and attractive microwave that worked great for 16 months until it stopped heating
customer_reviews.text: It was a relatively cheap and attractive microwave that worked great for 16 months until it stopped heating. It otherwise works and makes all the normal noises, but water stays cold no matter how long you run it. I guess the magnetron went bad, which is not easy to DIY repair so will recycle it and buy a different brand and hope it lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Slow working, dies within less than 2 weeks of warranty expiration.
customer_reviews.text: Takes an awful look b time to defrost/warm anything up compared to just about every other microwave I've used in my 36 years of life. Took longer than all those other microwaves but eventually did it's job. Microwave just bit it. Power shut down and it died mid-use. Checked on a warranty. Says 18 months. That was 11 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bodey007

customer_reviews.title: but that is really annoying when the last one had it
customer_reviews.text: Quirky little microwave. It doesn't have a +30 seconds button. It works, but that is really annoying when the last one had it. It also requires you to reset the timer if you want to start it with another time (10 seconds left and you need to cook it for 60, you have to press reset and then type 60 enter). Looks nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Ted H.

customer_reviews.title: GIVE ME A 30 Sec Button!!!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to. Works fine. Only complaint is there's no 30 second quick start button! No big deal but it took some getting use to since I used that button all the time on my last microwave. It's just too convenient and so that's the only flaw on this model.
customer_reviews.author: NRobinson

customer_reviews.title: Ready to start a fire
customer_reviews.text: Microwave popped today and started getting hot. So hot that it was becoming a fire hazard. I got lucky that I noticed it before it became an issue but this should never happen. That clearly is poor engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Peereboom

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Fills the house with a sickening plastic stench. After one use, front panel is filled with steam.
customer_reviews.author: Erase

customer_reviews.title: It works, but is loud with odd noises
customer_reviews.text: It works fine so far. Plenty of options. But it has made all sorts of odd noises. The turn table goes from silent to grinding all the time. Then it makes other odd noise. It gets loud when running then runs just fine for days on end without a peep. Not too sure about how long this one will last.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave. If I could change something it would ...
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave. If I could change something it would be the express cook options. You have to click on the express cook button and then start. To me, express cook should be express cook and nothing else. Also, I would love to have a 30 second cook button that allows you to start off with 30 seconds or add 30 seconds more to the cook time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: But this had good reviews and other
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I didn't think a cheap microwave would do it. But this had good reviews and other, "better" brands didn't fare as well. Figured at the price, what was there to lose? Well, I am impressed! It looks great, works great, and is simple to use (no need to use the manual - yes!!!) and fairly quiet. It is also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S. McGuinness

customer_reviews.title: I never write reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over two years ago. My children use and abuse it every day! This is one of the best appliances I have ever had. I originally purchased it because of its price (and money was tight!) This microwave has more than paid for itself. It is durable and heats food fantastically. If you are considering this microwave- don't hesitate. You will be glad you bought it
customer_reviews.author: Edie Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Spent considerable time researching microwaves. This Danby unit fit the bill both in size, styling and cost. Wanted one with a stainless steel interior, as my last one found the paint peeling from the roof of the microwave. Amazon sent this unit in a timely fashion and well packaged. Very pleased with my purchase .
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: Danby Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Great price, looks good, fits perfect, works flawless. For the price this may be the best microwave I have ever purchased. I would suggest this to anyone in need of a mid sized table top microwave. The stainless steel with black makes it look expensive and rather sharp. I would buy again and suggest it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Cody & Chelsey Craft

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Great Microwave for the price!! Also, looks great. Heats quickly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Z

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but not Elegant
customer_reviews.text: First...it's pretty big (something to considering if you live in an NYC apartment). Second...the door makes a pretty loud noise when you close the door. Third...there's a noise coming from the unit which sounds like the glass plate is shaking every time I use it. Overall, it heats up my food. That's all I really need.
customer_reviews.author: Deon

customer_reviews.title: Great but has loud beeper.
customer_reviews.text: Great but has loud beeper that goes off when food is done cooking/heating. And beeps five times. Not needed in my house. Also wish it had the 'add 30 seconds' feature. Otherwise a good all-purpose large microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Nifty@50 in NC

customer_reviews.title: THIS DANBY MICROWAVE DIED
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT recommend this microwave. It's only 20 months old and it suddenly stopped working. I was heating some leftovers and it died. I don't understand how an appliance should have such a short lifespan. I've just ordered a new one from another manufacturer and hope this one will last.
customer_reviews.author: mvmccas

customer_reviews.title: This microwave looks nice and arrived well packaged and in seemingly good condition
customer_reviews.text: This microwave looks nice and arrived well packaged and in seemingly good condition. I thought some of the plastic parts looked cheap but that was to be expected for the price. After 45 days of light use, the microwave stopped working. It would randomly lose power. Upon inspection, it seemed to be related to the area where the power cord connects to the body of the microwave. Jiggling that area would cause the power to come on while also making electrical/sparking type noises. Needless to say, I will be replacing it with a brand that is better manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: DO

customer_reviews.title: ... not used it as of yet but it looks great in my kitchen and I'm loving the two tone ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it as of yet but it looks great in my kitchen and I'm loving the two tone side paneling which is a very light blue stainless steel. Its crazy it reflects off my living room which the color is blue and you can see directly into my living room. Love how it looks. Setting clock was easy and typical just like most microwaves, nothing tricky about it.
customer_reviews.author: Meek Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: One of the better microwaves I've purchased over the years. Great size. Easy to set up. Looks great against the other stainless steel appliances in my kitchen. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: this is the best deal thank you Amazon I bought 2 one for ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the best deal thank you Amazon I bought 2 one for my home and one for my office works great its a slim look saves on power and very quiet running
customer_reviews.author: john berkoski

customer_reviews.title: Great Mircowave
customer_reviews.text: The microwave and is nicer then I expected for the price. It is stainless steel inside and out. they also include a replacement key pad cover. the only thing I do not like is the glass turntable did not come with a wheeled undercarriage to allow for smoother rotation, but other then that very nice and I would by again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lee Wood

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: traps steam in the front window and the whole thing gets really hot after 3 minutes, especially the rotating glass inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it Love it Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it Love it Love it, the beeps when it finishes are very low tone, do not drive you nuts, cooks quickly, very pretty and modern looking. The finish is pretty but does show a few fingerprints, not a big deal, wipes off easily. Light is nice inside when door is open as well as when it is in use
customer_reviews.author: Creston couple

customer_reviews.title: The oven would be almost as fast
customer_reviews.text: I hate this microwave. It takes forever to heat anything up. I put 4 oz of tap water in there for a minute at full power and it was lukewarm when I took it out. I unfortunately didn't keep the box and will probably just end up buying a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this works just fine; a bit loud, but that's what you get at these prices. Otherwise fine.
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Rolling Press

customer_reviews.title: Amazon reviews were misleading.
customer_reviews.text: One of my worst Amazon purchases. I hate this microwave and deeply regret purchasing it. It is GIANT and heavy, sits crooked on a flat surface, and heats food unevenly! You can get WAY better for LESS MONEY!!!!! Shocked, because usually Amazon reviews are so spot on.
customer_reviews.author: teejay

customer_reviews.title: Performancde and looks
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new microwave. It cooks my food so much quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra-D

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER ONLY 2 MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: i have had this literally ONLY TWO MONTHS and it DOES NOT HEAT AT ALL. sounds like it is working, looks like it is working, doesn't heat the food. Awesome. :/ - irritated & hungry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive microwave
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good microwave. I’ve had it for about a year and it’s still going strong. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: TyTy Ullery

customer_reviews.title: Works well and doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.text: Mom loves it. Heats up everything quickly and looks nice. I've had another model Danby for about 10 years. Still going.
customer_reviews.author: Limerick

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best out there.
customer_reviews.text: Not real impressed. Works ok while heating foods, but burns the popcorn every time. If I adjust the temp, it leaves way too many kernels unpopped.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bose

customer_reviews.title: and it would also be nice if it had one of those buttons to press ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a while now, so far no malfunctions. Decent size. I do wish it was a little quieter - the beeps are very loud, and it would also be nice if it had one of those buttons to press to just add 30 seconds to the current timer count, but overall pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: The size is great and the device is attractive
customer_reviews.text: The size is great and the device is attractive. The only draw back is how oversensitive the push buttons are. It takes a couple of times to set the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Bug

customer_reviews.title: If you need more than one per yer buy this one NOT
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and worked great for 4 months - then started making really loud grinding noises. Followed all of manufacturers directions for cleaning and use - it did not help. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money - received this oven, took it out of the box - door lash seemed flimsy - microwave did not work - plugged it and unplugged it several times, but nothing - read the instructions twice to ensure I was operating the unit correctly, to no avail, still did not work - light stayed on so it had to do with the door closing I believe - looked very nice but did not work. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia M. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year, no longer working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased less than a year ago, and the keypad is no longer functioning. We use this very little, and certainly expected at least several years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Turnipseed

customer_reviews.title: Works great. My only complaint is that there are no ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My only complaint is that there are no preset time buttons such as "add 30 seconds". If it had that I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: It had great reviews when we ordered it
customer_reviews.text: The finish is nice and matches our stainless steel/black wall oven nicely. However, the button to open the door no longer opens on the first try or needs some help. And occasionally something internal to the microwave makes a noise when the tray is rotating.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Z.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Works great. I've been using it since May, probably daily, and haven't had any issues at all. It's stainless on the inside as well, so it wipes clean easily. Food and beverages seem to heat evenly. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: MissB

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend and she tells me it's working out very well. Much better than either of us would have expected. I don't know how much of its functionality she's actually used.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Williams

customer_reviews.title: but it is a little slow and worse of all it has no way to quickly add ...
customer_reviews.text: Microwave and reheat function works well, but it is a little slow and worse of all it has no way to quickly add 30 seconds or a minute. You must always either select a mode or manually enter the cook time before starting.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Blomberg

customer_reviews.title: Had to get a new microwave and was recommended this one by my mother
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a new microwave and was recommended this one by my mother, and boy oh boy I didn't realize how big of a difference it would be!!! Heats everything so quickly, not as loud as my old one, and I absolutely LOVE how it's entirely stainless steel! Great quality microwave!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steam Emitting After 5 Minutes of Cooking
customer_reviews.text: The Danby 1.1 cu feet counter top microwave was a disappointment to me so I returned it for a refund; reason being, when cooking some potatoes in some water after 5 minutes steam was emitting from the hedged side of the door and steam was on the interior glass. I had never experience that reaction for a microwave; it alarmed me. Amazon would have replaced it in 4 months for the stainless type that I desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Its a good microwave, a little small but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: RandiSykes

customer_reviews.title: I've only had this for a few months, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a few months, and some of the keys are starting to bubble up (The start/stop key specifically). Still functioning as expected otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this microwave is there is NO 30 second button or 1 minute button for quick use. Miss those features. Other than that it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Veonn E.

customer_reviews.title: Love this microwave
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave! It was a bit larger than anticipated to fit on my counters, so measure it out for size first! Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Blaire K

customer_reviews.title: Pros: cheap, cooks well Cons: plastic over ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: cheap, cooks well Cons: plastic over buttons bubbling/loosening within a month, no +30sec or 1/2/3/4 auto cook buttons.
customer_reviews.author: schützenjunge

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, good price, speedy delivery. Bigger than i thought it would be...in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ratz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for a couple months. Now the motor is making noises and loud screeching sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome oven-I love it! Heats up quick and is quiet and oh so efficient
customer_reviews.author: Paula M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: What can you say. It looks sleek works great. We put it in our office and everyone uses. They thought I went cheap because it says Danby. Who cares.
customer_reviews.author: Howie Ramone

customer_reviews.title: Going strong after nearly 4 years
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this microwave for nearly 4 years, using it daily, and we’ve never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Faye B.

customer_reviews.title: Quit without warning after a little over a year
customer_reviews.text: Bought just over a year ago and today ,without warning, it stopped working. It comes on, but doesn't heat. Have been satisfied up until now
customer_reviews.author: lora owen

customer_reviews.title: Stainless on the inside!
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is perfect! It's stainless on the inside, too! No more nasty plastic to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and the stainless steel inside but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the stainless steel inside but I hate the door and there is no easy button too complex and time consuming to start up won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: janjan

customer_reviews.title: Not in love with it
customer_reviews.text: Not in love with it. But does a fine job. One set of my plates are too wide so it won't turn. Find that sometimes the middle of my food doesn't seem to be warmed and the outside is hot.
customer_reviews.author: morey25

customer_reviews.title: It cooks good when it wants to cook
customer_reviews.text: For some unknown reason cooking food is a difficult task to cook. I follow the instructions to cook food. cook it for 4 minutes and after 4 minutes of cooking my food is still cold. After several more minutes of cooking and waiting, it finally decides to cook my food. I love the design and have no problem with anything else but i just wanted to address this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and easy to keep clean. Not as powerful as I'd have liked. Must heat for longer than I'm used to with my last microwave.
customer_reviews.author: sherry parker

customer_reviews.title: It does not cook evenly like panasonic inverter and i returned it within 10 days
customer_reviews.text: this is an ok microwave. It does not cook evenly like panasonic inverter and i returned it within 10 days. For people who need a quick cheap microwave, it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Fried itself within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Received Microwave on 10/11, hooked it up on 10/14. On 10/25 microwave overheated and died. Do Not Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Firebaugh

customer_reviews.title: Had this for two months and so far working well ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for two months and so far working well enough. Touchscreen has some bubbling of the cover but so far minor.
customer_reviews.author: TDemart

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave. Works great in all ways. Stainless inside and out cleans easy. DOOR BUTTON WORKS FINE. Noise is normal. Buy it and be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Is easy to use and neutral colors will go with almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Does everything a microwave is supposed to do. Does not do things a microwave is not supposed to do. Is easy to use and neutral colors will go with almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Erica H

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized microwave!
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave.This size is perfect for all dishes.love the push plate for the door.Had handle ones prior and they end up messing with the power on the microwave.They are hooked in with the wiring.So far so good.Very attractive also.
customer_reviews.author: lynarn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i have had it almost a year, still working. plastic on numbers is cracking
customer_reviews.author: barby

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good Microwave! I was scared to buy one online ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good Microwave! I was scared to buy one online but this works great and looks great as well!! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: maranda giebler

product_meta.title: Danby DMW111KPSSDD Countertop Microwave
product_meta.description:
Stylish and efficient cooking are easy to achieve with this remarkable mid-sized microwave oven by Danby. This model offers a generous 1.1 cubic feet (31.15 litres) of interior cooking and heating area with a maximum power output of 1000 watts. It features a fashionable and durable stainless-steel interior and exterior which allows it to easily assimilate with any type of existing décor. The unit comes with numerous cooking options as it offers 10 different power levels to choose from. There are six separate one-touch cooking settings for popular foods such as frozen dinners, popcorn, and pizza as well as speed-defrost, cook-by-weight, and defrost-by-weight specialty programs. The state-of-the-art electronic controls are a breeze to program and monitor via the easy-to-read LED timer and clock unit. This high-quality microwave oven also comes with an 18-month warranty on parts and labor.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Danby 1.1 cu.ft. Stainless Microwave
feature_bullets: 1000 watts of cooking power, Dimensions - 15.9 x 21.2 x 11.8 inches
Durable and stylish stainless steel interior and exterior
10 power levels.Simple one touch cooking for 6 popular uses
Product Width 43.97 cm,Product Depth 35.56 cm,Product Height 25.72 cm
